channel.title: Make butler's party prevent conversions
channel.description: I mean, it is an ability limited to 2 uses and it works great on cult games but in unseen games you can still be converted even if you use it at the right time, I think it should make you immune to conversions so it works better in unseen games as well.

item.title: Make butler's party prevent conversions
item.dc:creator: Loudo
item.description:
Having the Mastermind be occupy immune already has some huge drawbacks, I donâ€™t see why you would want to remove the advantages.

I mean, it is an ability limited to 2 uses and it works great on cult games but in unseen games you can still be converted even if you use it at the right time, I think it should make you immune to conversions so it works better in unseen games as well.
